translation.culturaTexto: German culture values ​​family and community, with an emphasis on following rules to create a pleasant environment. Beer plays a central role in culture, with a wide variety of brewing styles and traditions dating back centuries. German food is known for its sausages, sauerkraut, pretzels, soups, pies and cheeses, with the tradition of 'Kaffee und Kuchen' of coffee and cake. Rich German cuisine is an important part of celebrations and parties throughout the year, and each region has its own specialties.
